testcase.system-out: Given I am on the NHS jobs search page......................................passed When I enter job title "Nurse"..............................................passed And I enter location "London"...............................................passed And I click on search button................................................passed Then I wait for search results to be displayed..............................passed Then I wait for sort by dropdown to show default Best Match.................passed When I select Date Posted newest from sort by dropdown......................passed Then the sort by dropdown should have Date Posted newest selected...........passed
